text: DishesBibimbapThin sliced beef, mushroom, spinach, onion, carrot, zucchini, paprika, and a sunny side-up egg. Served with rice and gochujang sauce (a spicy Korean red pepper sauce).CAD$18.50 - CAD$19.50Fried ChickenChicken wings is perfectly crunchy outside and deliciously juicy inside. You can try them both!
